title: Venus Affairs - Rescued: Mission 2
description: A routine investigation of a destroyed deep-space mining outpost turns deliciously erotic when ship's engineer Shannon McCall rescues the lone survivor, a fellow engineer who's extremely eager to express ï»¿his gratitude in the most sensual way.The missions of The Venus Affairs are erotic short stories which involve intense romantic and sexual encounters between the women of the Starship Venus and all manner of alien species throughout the universe. This explicit content is intended for mature audiences only.
author: Abbi Aaker
